articles.author: Mark Ogden
articles.title: Why Manchester United supporters hate the Glazers, the club's American owners - ESPN
articles.description: Man United supporters have protested against them since 2005 and they might loosen their ownership. Are the walls finally closing in on the Glazers?
articles.content: A first impression is often a good indicator of what is to come, so the evening of June 30, 2005, would have told the Glazer family -- the American businessmen who have owned the Tampa Bay Buccaneers… [+20636 chars]

articles.title: How Queen Elizabeth reacted when asked 'have you ever met the Queen?' by American tourist who didn't recognise her - Newshub
articles.description: The reaction revealed the fun-loving side of her personality the public rarely saw.
articles.content:
She did not say she was referring to Balmoral.
Aware the castle was in the vicinity, the hiker then asked her if she had ever met the Queen, Griffin said.
